nxt

Class NxtApplication

  • java.lang.Object
    • nxt.NxtOperation
      • nxt.NxtApplication

  • public class NxtApplication
extends NxtOperation
    The main application of the NXT project

    The application receives commands from the PC application and act upon them

      • readRgbAverage

        public static int[] readRgbAverage(int numberOfSamples)
        Read color from sensor
        Parameters:
        numberOfSamples - Number of reading to perform
        Returns:
        RGB array, each of the first three values between 0 to 255, last value is background

      • runCommandListener

        private static void runCommandListener()
        Run the main loop waiting for command from PC

        This function exits upon pressing the ESC button on the NXT

        public static void main(String[] args)
        Main function of the NXT application
